trans-unit.source: Possibly this is an old Bloom Pack created before Bloom Packs could handle special characters in file names. You may be able to get the author to re-create it using a current version. If that's not possible a technical expert may be able to repair things.
trans-unit.target: Kuna uwezekana kuwa hii ni seti ya kitambo ya Bloom iliyotengenezwa kabla ya Seti ya Bloom kuwa na uwezo wa kushughulikia herufi za kipekee katika majina ya faili.Unaweza kupata mwandishi ili apate kukiandaa upya kwa kutumia tafsiri ya kisasa. Iwapo hii haiwezekani mtaalamu wa kiufundi anaweza kukarabati vitu.

trans-unit.source: The {0} Collection is now ready to use on this computer.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko sasa uko tayari kutumika kwenye kompyuta hii {0}.
Kifaa cha kuweka Seti ya Bloom
trans-unit.note: Displayed as the message box title

trans-unit.source: This BloomPack appears to be incomplete or corrupt.
trans-unit.target: Seti hii ya Bloom inaonekana kutokamilika au kuharibika.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to install that Bloom Pack
trans-unit.target: Bloom haikuweza kuweka Seti hiyo ya Bloom.

trans-unit.note: Shown while Bloom Packs are being installed

trans-unit.source: Bloom is already running, but the contents will not show up until the next time you run Bloom
trans-unit.target: Bloom tayari inaendelea, lakini yaliyomo hayatajitokeza hadi wakati huo mwingine utakapofungua Bloom

trans-unit.source: The Bloom collection will not be installed.
This computer already has a Bloom collection named '{0}'. Do you want to replace it with the one from this Bloom Pack?
trans-unit.target: Kompyuta hii tayari ina mkusanyiko wa Bloom kwa jina '{0}'. Je, unataka kuubadilisha kwa huu mwingine ulio kwenye Seti hii ya Bloom?

trans-unit.source: Bloom Packs should have only a single collection folder at the top level of the .ZIP file.
trans-unit.target: Seti za Bloom zinapaswa kuwa na folda moja tu ya mkusanyiko kwenye ngazi ya juu ya .ZIP faili.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to remove the existing copy of '{0}'. Quit Bloom if it is running & try again. Otherwise, try again after restarting your computer.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haikuweza kutoa nakala iliyopo ya '{0}'. Funga Bloom iwapo imefunguliwa na ujaribu tena. Vinginevyo, jaribu tena baada ya kufungua kompyuta yako upya.

trans-unit.source: To select, use your mouse wheel or point at what you want, then release the key.
trans-unit.target: Ili kuchagua, tumia gurudumu la mausi yako au uelekeze unachokitaka, kisha uachilie kii.
trans-unit.note: When you hold down a key, a popup appears that lets you choose a related character. These instructions are shown in that popup.

trans-unit.source: This formatting is the default for all text boxes with '{0}' style.
trans-unit.target: Aina hii ya muundo kwa kawaida hutumika kwa visanduku vyote vya maandishi viliyo na mtindo '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: This formatting is for all text boxes with '{0}' style.
trans-unit.target: Aina hii ya muundo inatumika kwa visanduku vyote vya matini vilivyo na mtindo wa '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: This formatting is for all {0} text boxes with '{1}' style.
trans-unit.target: Aina hii ya muundo hutumika kwa {0} visanduku vyote vya maandishi vilivyo na mtindo wa '{1}'.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, Reader Templates do not allow changes to formatting.
trans-unit.target: Samahani, Vigezo vya msomaji haviruhusu mabadiliko kwa muundo.

trans-unit.source: It appears that some part of the folder path to this book has been moved or renamed. As a result, Bloom cannot save your changes to this page, and will need to exit now. If you haven't been renaming or moving things, please click Details below and report the problem to the developers.
trans-unit.target: Inaonekana kwamba baadhi ya sehemu za njia ya folda kufikia kitabu hiki zimetolewa au kupewa jina upya. Hivyo, Bloom haiwezi kuhifadhi mabadiliko yako ya ukurasa huu, na itahitaji kujifunga sasa. Iwapo hujakuwa ukivipa vitu majina upya au kuvisongesha, tafadhali bofya Maelezo yaliyo hapa chini na uripoti tatizo hili kwa wataalamu husika.

trans-unit.source: Open Page in Firefox (which must be in the PATH environment variable).
trans-unit.target: Fungua ukurasa kwenye Mtandao (ambao ni lazima uwe kwenye hali inayoweza kubadilika ya NJIA).
Mpangilio wa hali ya Juu wa Programu

trans-unit.source: Show Experimental Commands (e.g. Export XML for InDesign)
trans-unit.target: Onyesha Maagizo ya Kimajaribio (kama vile XML ya nje ya Mtindo wa Ndani)
Onyesha Vigezo vya Kimajaribio (kama vile kamusi ya picha.)

trans-unit.source: Use Image Server to reduce memory usage with large images.
trans-unit.target: Tumia chanzo cha picha ili kupunguza matumizi ya nafasi kwa picha kubwa.
trans-unit.note: This option will probably go away, as any bugs with the Image Server get ironed out. This has to do with how Bloom works internally; the I.S. makes it work better on slow computers.

trans-unit.source: Bloom is switching the default font for "{0}" to the new "Andika New Basic".
trans-unit.target: Bloom inabadilisha fonti ya kawaida ya "{0}" kuwa mpya ya "Andika Mpya ya Kimsingi".

trans-unit.source: This will improve the printed output for most languages. If your language is one of the few that need "Andika", you can switch it back in Settings:Book Making.
trans-unit.target: Hii itaboresha matokeo ya machapisho ya lugha nyingi. Iwapo lugha yako ni mojawapo ya chache zinazohitaji "Andika", unaweza kuirudisha tena kwenye mpangilio:Kutengeneza Kitabu.

trans-unit.note: Name of a Front/Back Matter Pack that puts credits on the inside of the front cover
Name of the default Front/Back Matter Pack

trans-unit.target: Mfumo wa Kulia hadi Kushoto wa Kuandika

trans-unit.note: In a local language collection, we say 'Local Language', but in a source collection, Local Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a local language collection, we say 'Language 2 (e.g. National Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a local language collection, we say 'Language 3 (e.g. Regional Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
If there is no third language specified, the link changes to this.

trans-unit.target: Lugha yangu 3 (kama vile lugha ya eneo) (Sio lazima)

trans-unit.note: If you make certain changes in the settings dialog, the OK button changes to this.

trans-unit.source: Bloom will close and re-open this project with the new settings.
trans-unit.target: Bloom itafunga na kufungua tena mradi huu kwa mpangilio mpya.
Tengeneza Seti ya Bloom ya Kigezo cha Msomaji...

trans-unit.source: Your system administrator manages Bloom updates for this computer.
trans-unit.target: Utawala wa mfumo wako hudhibiti utengenezaji upya wa kompyuta hii.

trans-unit.source: Get more source books at BloomLibrary.org
trans-unit.target: Pata vitabu vingi zaidi vya vyanzo kwenye BloomLibrary.org
trans-unit.note: Shown at the bottom of the list of books. User can click on it and it will attempt to open a browser to show the Bloom Library
get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection

trans-unit.source: Bloom will now open this HTML document in your word processing program (normally Word or LibreOffice). You will be able to work with the text and images of this book. These programs normally don't do well with preserving the layout, so don't expect much.
trans-unit.target: Bloom sasa itafungua nyaraka hii HTML kwenye programu yako ya kutengeneza maneno(kwa kawaida neno au Ofisi ya Libre). Utaweza kufanya kazi kwa maandishi na picha za kitabu hiki. Programu hizi kwa kawaida sio nzuri kwa kuhifadhi mtindo, hivyo usitarajie mengi.
Peleka kwenye neno au Ofisi ya Libre...
Peleka kwa XML kwa mtindo wa ndani...
Tengeneza upya ukucha wa dole gumba

trans-unit.source: This collection is locked, so new books cannot be added/removed.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko huu umefungwa, kwa hivyo vitabu vipya haviwezi kuongezwa/kutolewa.

trans-unit.source: Because this is a source collection, Bloom isn't offering any existing shells as sources for new shells. If you want to add a language to a shell, instead you need to edit the collection containing the shell, rather than making a copy of it. Also, the Wall Calendar currently can't be used to make a new Shell.
trans-unit.target: Kwa kuwa huu ni mkusanyiko wa chanzo, Broom haipeani sheli zozote zingine kama vyanzo vya sheli mpya. Iwapo unataka kuongeza lugha kwa sheli, badala yake unapaswa kuhariri mkusanyiko ulio na sheli, badala ya kutengeneza nakala yake. Pia, Kalenda ya Ukuta kwa sasa haiwezi kutumika kutengeneza Sheli mpya.

trans-unit.source: Make a book using this source.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza kitabu kwa kutumia chanzo hiki.

trans-unit.source: Create a book in my language using this source book.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza kitabu kwa lugha yangu kwa kutumia kitabu hiki kama chanzo.

trans-unit.note: This is is the button you use to create a new collection, open a new one, or get one from a repository somewhere.
This is is the button you use to create a new collection, open a new one, or get one from a repository somewhere.
Shown as the thumbnail caption when the book doesn't have a title.

trans-unit.source: Could not connect to the server to check for an update. Are you connected to the internet?
trans-unit.target: Hauwezi kuunganishwa kwa mtandao ili kupata utengenezaji upya. Umejiunganisha na intaneti?
trans-unit.note: Shown when Bloom tries to check for an update but can't, for example because it can't connect to the internet, or a problems with our server, etc.

trans-unit.source: Your Bloom is up to date.
trans-unit.target: Bloom yako iko katika hali ya kisasa.

trans-unit.source: Bloom is already working on checking for updates.
trans-unit.target: Bloom hufanya kazi kila wakati kwa kuchunguza utengenezaji upya.

trans-unit.source: A new version appears to be available, but Bloom could not install it.
trans-unit.target: Tafsiri mpya inaonekana kupatikana, lakini Bloom isiingeweza kuiweka.

trans-unit.note: Appears after Bloom has downloaded a program update in the background and is ready to switch the user to it the next time they run Bloom.

trans-unit.source: A new version of Bloom is available.

trans-unit.note: In a wizard, this button takes you to the previous step.
Used for the Finish button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
This is shown when Bloom is slowly loading something, so the user doesn't worry about why they don't see the result immediately.
Used for the Next button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
In a wizard, this button takes you to the next step.

trans-unit.source: Your download ({0}) is complete. You can see it in the 'Books from BloomLibrary.org' section of your Collections.
trans-unit.target: Upakuaji wako mtandaoni ({0}) umekamilika. Unaweza kuliona katika 'Vitabu kutoka kwenye kitengo cha Mkusanyiko wako cha BloomLibrary.org'.

trans-unit.source: Bloom downloaded the book but had problems making it available in Bloom. Please restart your computer and try again. If you get this message again, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom developers.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilitoa kitabu lakini ilipata matatizo katika kukifanya kuonekana kwenye Bloom. Tafadhali fungua kompyuta yako upya na ujaribu tena. Iwapo utapata ujumbe huu tena, tafadhali bofya kwenye kitufe cha 'Maelezo' na uripoti tatizo hili kwa wataalamu husika wa Bloom.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem downloading your book.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika upakuaji wa kitabu chako.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem downloading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika upakuaji kitabu chako.Unaweza kuhitajika kufungua upya Bloom au kupata usaidizii wa kiufudi.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem downloading the book: something took too long. You can try again at a different time, or write to us at issues@BloomLibrary.org if you cannot get the download to work from your location.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo wakati wa kupakua kitabu hiki: kitu fulani kilitumia muda mrefu sana. Unaweza kujaribu tena wakati mwingine, au utuandikie kwa issues@BloomLibrary.org iwapo huwezi kupata toleo la kitabu ili kufanya kazi kutoka mahali ulipo.

trans-unit.note: This is for the button that LAUNCHES the dialog, not the "Add this page" button that is IN the dialog.
This is for the button inside the dialog

trans-unit.source: Converting to this layout will cause some content to be lost.
trans-unit.target: Kubadilisha hadi kuwa katika muundo huu kutafanya baadhi ya yaliyohumu kupotea.

trans-unit.source: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the back cover.
trans-unit.target: Iwapo unahitaji mahali pa kuandika habari zaidi kuhusu kitabu, unaweza kutumia ukurasa huu, ambao ndio wa ndani wa jalada la nyuma.

trans-unit.source: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the outside of the back cover.
trans-unit.target: Iwapo unahitaji mahali pa kuandika habari zaidi kuhusu kitabu, unaweza kutumia ukurasa huu ambao ndio wa nje wa jalada la nyuma.

trans-unit.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for bilingual mode, 2 languages per page

trans-unit.source: Open the HTML used to make this PDF, in Firefox (must be on path)
trans-unit.target: Fungua iliyotumika kutengeneza hima , kwenye mtandao (lazima iwe kwenye njia)

trans-unit.source: Sorry, the copyright and license for this book cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Samahani, haki ya kunakili na leseni ya kitabu hiki haiwezi kubadilishwa.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, this book is locked down so that images cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Samahani, kitabu hiki kimefungiwa ili picha zisiweze kubadilishwa.

trans-unit.source: This page will be permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa huu utatolewa na hauwezi kurejeshwa tena.

trans-unit.source: Choose language to make this a bilingual or trilingual book
trans-unit.target: Chagua lugha ili kufanya hiki kuwa kitabu cha lugha mbili au lugha tatu

trans-unit.source: You need to select some text before you can copy it
trans-unit.target: Unapaswa kuchagua baadhi ya maandishi kabla ya kuinakili

trans-unit.source: Copy this information to all other pictures in this book?
trans-unit.target: Nakili habari hii kwenye picha zote katika kitabu hiki?
trans-unit.note: get this after you edit the metadata of an image
Shown between 'Picture' and 'Text' when Custom Page is in Layout mode

trans-unit.source: You need to select some text before you can cut it
trans-unit.target: Unapaswa kuchagua baadhi ya maandishi kabla ya kuyakata

trans-unit.source: Remove this page from the book
Insert a new page which is a duplicate of this one
trans-unit.target: Ingiza ukurasa mpya ambao ni nakala ya huu

trans-unit.source: You cannot change these because this is not the original copy.
trans-unit.target: Hauwezi kubadilisha hii kwa kuwa hii siyo nakala ya kwanza.

trans-unit.source: This word is not decodable in this stage.
trans-unit.target: Neno ili haliwezi kufasiriwa katika ukurasa huu.

trans-unit.source: This sentence is too long for this level.
trans-unit.target: Sentensi ni ndefu sana kwa hatua hii.

trans-unit.source: This page is an experimental prototype which may have many problems, for which we apologize.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa huu ni sampuli ya awali ya majaribio ambayo inaweza kuwa na matatizo mengi, ambapo tunaomba radhi.

trans-unit.source: The current selected font is '{0}', but it is not installed on this computer. Some other font will be used.
trans-unit.target: Fonti iliyochaguliwa kwa sasa ni '', lakini haijawekwa kwenye kompyuta hii.Fonti nyingine itatumiwa.

trans-unit.source: That style already exists. Please choose another name.
trans-unit.target: Mtindo huo tayari uko. Tafadhali chagua jina lingine

trans-unit.source: Changes the text size for all boxes carrying the style '{0}' and language '{1}'.\nCurrent size is {2}pt.
trans-unit.target: Badilisha ukubwa wa maandishi kwa visanduku vyote vilivyo na mtindo wa '{0}' na lugha '{1}'.\nUkubwa uliopo sasa ni pt {2}.

trans-unit.source: Change the spacing between lines of text
trans-unit.target: Badilisha nafasi kati ya mistari ya maandishi

trans-unit.source: Please use only alphabetical characters. Numbers at the end are ok, as in "part2".
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali tumia tu herufi za kialfabeti. Nambari zilizo mwisho ziko sawa, kama zilivyo kwenye "sehemu ya2".

trans-unit.source: You may use this space for author/illustrator, or anything else.
trans-unit.target: Unaweza kutumia nafasi hii kwa mwandishi/mchoraji, au chochote kile.

trans-unit.source: When you are making an original book, use this box to record contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc.
trans-unit.target: Unapotengeneza kitabu cha kwanza, tumia kisanduku hiki ili kurekodi mchango uliopeanwa na waandishi, wachoraji, wahakiki, na kadhalika.

trans-unit.source: When you make a book from a shell, use this box to tell who did the translation.
trans-unit.target: Unapotengeneza kitabu kutoka kwa sheli, tumia kitabu hiki kusema aliyetafsri.

trans-unit.note: Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.

trans-unit.source: Click to Edit Copyright and License
trans-unit.target: Bofya kwenye Kuhakiki Haki ya Kunakili na Leseni.

trans-unit.source: Use this to acknowledge any funding agencies.
trans-unit.target: Tumia hii kutambua maajenti wote waliopeana usaidizi wa kifedha.

trans-unit.source: International Standard Book Number. Leave blank if you don't have one of these.
trans-unit.target: Nambari ya Wastani ya Kitabu ya Kimataifa. Acha wazi iwapo huna mojawapo ya hizi.

trans-unit.source: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the front cover.
trans-unit.target: Iwapo unahitaji mahali pa kuandika habari zaidi kuhusu kitabu, unaweza kutumia ukurasa huu, ambao ni wa upande wa ndani wa jalada la mbele.
Ya kwanza au utambulizi wa (Sheli) katika {lang}

trans-unit.source: The contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc., in {lang}
trans-unit.target: Mchango uliotolewa na waandishi, wafundishi, wahakiki, na kadhalika katika {lang}

trans-unit.source: To unlock this shellbook, go into the toolbox on the right, find the gear icon, and click 'Allow changes to this shellbook'.
trans-unit.target: Ili kufungua kitabu hiki cha sheli, nenda kwenye kijisanduku cha vifaa katika upande wa kulia, tafuta ikoni ya gia, na ukliki 'Kubali mabadiliko kwa kitabu hiki cha sheli'.

trans-unit.source: Edit Image Credits, Copyright, and License
trans-unit.target: Hariri Sifa za Picha, Haki ya kunakili, na Leseni

trans-unit.source:
The file youve chosen is a JPEG file. JPEG files are perfect for photographs and color artwork. However, JPEG files are a big problem for black and white line art. Problems include:
 Fuzziness and grey dots.
 Large file sizes, making the book hard to share.
 If there are many large JPEGs, Bloom may not have enough memory to make PDF files.

Note: Because JPEG is lossy, converting a JPEG to PNG, TIFF, or BMP actually makes things even worse. If this is black and white line art, you want to get an original scan in one of those formats.

Please select from one of the following, then click OK:
trans-unit.target:
Faili uliyochagua ni faili JPEG. JPEG faili huwa bora zaidi kwa picha na kazi ya sanaa ya rangi. Hata hivyo, JPEG faili huwa tatizo kuu kwa sanaa ya mistari mieusi na mieupe. Matatizo yanajumuisha:
 Siobainika na vitone vya rangi ya kijivuu.
 Faili kubwa, na kuifanya vigumu kusambaza kitabu.
 Iwapo kuna vingi vikubwa JPEG, Bloom huenda isiwe na nafasi ya kutosha ili kutengeneza PDF faili.

Kumbuka: Kwa sababu JPEG ni hasara, kubadilisha JPEG kuwa PNG, TIFF, BMP kwa kweli huharibu mambo zaidi. Iwapo hii ni sanaa ya mstari mweusi na mweupe, unataka kupata skani kwa mojawapo ya miundo hiyo.

Tafadhali chagua mojawapo ya yafuatayo, kisha bofya SAWA:

trans-unit.source: This option is only available in the Publish tab.
trans-unit.target: Chaguo hili linapatikana tu kwenye nembo ya Kuchapisha.

trans-unit.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for monolingual mode, one language per page
Default file and folder name when you make a new book, but haven't give it a title yet.

trans-unit.source: Before you can paste an image, copy one onto your 'clipboard', from another program.
trans-unit.target: Kabla ya kuweka picha, nakili moja kwa 'klipbodi', kutoka kwa programu nyingine.

trans-unit.source: There are no other layout options for this template.
trans-unit.target: Hakuna chaguo lingine la miundo kwa kigezo hiki.
trans-unit.note: Show in the layout chooser dropdown of the edit tab, if there was only a single layout choice

trans-unit.source: This box has more text than will fit
trans-unit.target: Kisanduku hiki kina maandishi mengi zaidi kuliko yatakayotoshea

trans-unit.source: A container on this page is overflowing
trans-unit.target: Kifaa kwenye ukurasa huu kimejaa kupita kiasi

trans-unit.source: That change is not allowed. Front matter and back matter pages must remain where they are.
trans-unit.target: Mabadiliko hayo hayakubaliwi. Machapisho ya upande wa mbele na machapisho ya upande wa nyuma yanapaswa kusalia pale yalipo.

trans-unit.source: Choose a page size and orientation
trans-unit.target: Chagua ukubwa wa ukurasa na maelekezo

trans-unit.source: There is nothing on the Clipboard that you can paste here.
trans-unit.target: Hakuna chochote kwenye klipbodi ambacho unaweza kuweka hapa.

trans-unit.source: You cannot put anything in there while making an original book.
trans-unit.target: Huwezi kuweka chochote pale ndani unapotengeneza kitabu cha kwanza.

trans-unit.source: Change the spacing between lines of text
trans-unit.target: Badilisha nafasi kati ya mistari ya maandishi
Ongeza au punguza muundo wa mtindo

trans-unit.source: Bloom can handle only the first {0} words.
trans-unit.target: Bloom inaweza tu kukubali maneno ya kwanza tu {0}.

trans-unit.source: The following is a generated report of the decodable stages for {0}. You can make any changes you want to this file, but Bloom will not notice your changes. It is just a report.
trans-unit.target: Ifuatayo ni ripoti iliyotolewa ya awamu zinazoweza kufasiriwa kwa {0}. Unaweza kufanya mabadiliko yoyote unayotaka kwa faili hii,lakini Bloom Haitatambua mabadiliko yako.Ni ripoti tu.

trans-unit.source: Open a Letter and Word List File
trans-unit.target: Fungua jalada la Orodha ya Herufi na Maneno

trans-unit.source: Generate a letter and word list report
trans-unit.target: Anzisha ripoti ya orodha ya herufi na neno
Chukua maneno kutoka kwenye awamu hii

trans-unit.note: Used to create string "Level # of #". The space after this word is added programmatically.
Used to create string "Level # of #". The spaces on each side of this word are added programmatically.

trans-unit.target: Kubali mabadiliko kwenye kitabu hiki cha sheli

trans-unit.source: Bloom normally prevents most changes to shellbooks. If you need to add pages, change images, etc., tick the box below.
trans-unit.target: Bloom kwa kawaida huzuia mabadiliko mengi kwenye vitabu vya sheli. Iwapo utahitaji kuongeza kurasa, kubadlisha picha na kadhalika, weka alama kwenye kisanduku kilicho hapa chini.

trans-unit.source: Bloom recording is in an unusual state, possibly caused by unplugging a microphone. You will need to restart.
trans-unit.target: Kurekodi kwa Bloom kuko katika hali isiyo ya kawaida, ambayo huenda ikawa imesababishwa na kutoa mikrofoni. Utahitajika kuianzisha upya.
trans-unit.note: This is very low priority for translation.

trans-unit.source: This computer appears to have no sound recording device available. You will need one to record audio for a talking book.
trans-unit.target: Kompyuta hii inaonekana kutokuwa na kifaa cha kurekodi sauti. Utahitajika kurekodi sauti ya kitabu kilicho na sauti.

trans-unit.source: Please hold the button down until you have finished recording
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali shikilia kitufe ukielekeza upande wa chini hadi umalize kurekodi
trans-unit.note: Appears when the speak/record button is pressed very briefly

trans-unit.source: 1) Check that you are recording into the correct device and that these levels are showing blue:
trans-unit.target: 1) Angalia ili kuhakikisha kuwa unarekodi kwenye kifaa kinachofaa na kuwa ngazi hizi zinaonyesha rangi ya buluu:
Kifaa cha Kitabu kilicho na Sauti

trans-unit.source: Make an e-book that can play recordings while highlighting sentences.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza kitabu cha mtandao ambacho kinaweza kucheza yaliyorekodiwa unapoweka alama ya kusisitiza kwa sentensi.

trans-unit.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for trilingual mode, 3 languages per page

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong.
trans-unit.target: Bloom imekuwa na tatizo katika kuonyesha kitabu hiki. Hii haimaanishi kuwa kazi yako imepotea, lakini inamaanisha kuwa kuna kitu kimepitwa na wakati, kimepotea, au kimeharibika.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong. Consider using the 'Report a Problem' command under the 'Help' menu.
trans-unit.target: Bloom imekuwa na tatizo katika kuonyesha kitabu hiki. Hii haimaanishi kuwa kazi yako imepotea, lakini inamaanisha kuwa kuna kitu kimepitwa na wakati, kimepotea, au kimeharibika. Kubali kutumia kielelezo cha 'Ripoti Tatizo' kilicho chini ya 'Usaidizi'.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed. The agressive firewall product may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilishindwa kuanzisha kifaa cha HTTP cha kusikiza ambacho huwa inatumia kuwasiliana na kifaa chake kilichotiwa ndani cha mtandao wa intaneti. Iwapo hii itatendeka hata ingawa ulikuwa tu umefungua upya kompyuta yako, ambia mtu achunguze iwapo una kifaa kinachotumika kwa nguvu ambacho kimewekwa kwenye mtandao. Kifaa hiki kinachotumika kwa nguvu kilicho kwenye mtandao kinaweza kuhitajika kutolewa kabla ya wewe kuweza kutumia Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Your computer denied Bloom access to the book. You may need technical help in setting the operating system permissions for this file.
trans-unit.target: Kompyuta yako ilikataza Blook kupata kitabu. Unaweza kuhitaji usaidizi wa kifundi ili kuandaa mfumo wa utenda kazi idhini ya kupata faili hii.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuchagua kitabu. Kufungua upya Bloom kunaweza kusuluhisha tatizo hili. Iwapo haitawezekana, tafadhali kliki kifute cha 'Maelezo' na uripoti tatizo kwa Wataalamu husika wa Bloom.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem updating the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kutengeneza upya kitabu. Kufungua upya Bloom kunaweza kusuluhisha tatizo hili. Iwapo haitawezekana, tafadhali kliki kifute cha 'Maelezo' na uripoti tatizo kwa Wataalamu husika wa Bloom.

trans-unit.source: {0} requires a newer version of Bloom. Download the latest version of Bloom from {1}.
trans-unit.target: {0} huhitaji tafsiri mpya zaidi ya Bloom. Toa tafsiti mpya ya Bloom kutoka kwa {1}.
trans-unit.note: {0} will get the name of the book, {1} will give a link to open the Bloom Library Web page.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem deleting this file: {0}
trans-unit.target: Bloom inapata tatizo katika kufuta picha hii: {0}

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem importing this picture.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilipata tatizo katika kuipokea picha hii

trans-unit.source: Report this problem to Bloom Support
trans-unit.target: Ripoti tatizo hili kwa Usaidizi wa

trans-unit.source: This Book called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but Bloom couldn't find that on this computer. You can either install a Bloom Pack that will give you '{0}', or go to Settings:Book Making and change to another Front/Back Matter Pack.
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kilihitaji seti ya machapisho ya Mbele/Nyuma iitwayo '{0}', lakini Bloom haikuipata kwenye kompyuta hii. Unaweza kuweka Seti ya Bloom itakayokupa '{0}', au uende kwa Mpangilio:Kutengeneza Kitabu na ubadilishe kuwa seti tofauti ya machapisho ya Mbele/Nyuma.

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haiwezi kujifungua inavyofaa, na dalili hii imeonekana kwenye mashine zilizowekwa King'ora cha Eneo. Kumbuka: kuzima King'ora cha Eneo hakusaidii. Wala kufungua upya huku kikiwa kimezimwa. Kitu fulani kuhusu uwekaji wa King'ora cha Eneo husababisha tatizo, na hivyo kukitoa king'ora cha eneo tu kumeonyesha kusuluhisha tatizo.

trans-unit.source: A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.
trans-unit.target: Sehemu ya Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, inaonekana kupotea. Hii inazuia kuonekana kwa onyesho la awali na uchapishaji. programu ya antivairasi wakati mwingine hufanya hivi. Unaweza kuhitaji usadizi wa kifundi ili kukarabati uwekaji wa Bloom na kuzuia faili hii kufutika tena.

trans-unit.source: This script is right to left
trans-unit.target: Hati hii imeandikwa kutoka kulia kwenda kushoto
Hati hii inahitaji mistari mirefu zaidi
Muundo wa A4 wa Kila upande
Muundo wa A4 Hugawanya Katikati ya Kurasa
Mpangilio wa chini wa picha ya A5

trans-unit.source: I accept the terms of the license agreement
trans-unit.target: Ninakubali makubaliano ya masharti ya leseni

trans-unit.source: I agree to the Bloom Library's Terms of Use
trans-unit.target: Ninakubaliana na Masharti ya matumizi ya Maktaba ya Bloom

trans-unit.source: There is already a collection with that name, at {0}.\nPlease pick a unique name.
trans-unit.target: Tayari kuna mkusanyiko ulio na jina kama hilo, kwenye {0}.\nTafadhali chagua jina la kipekee.

trans-unit.source: Choose the Main Language For This Collection
trans-unit.target: Chagua lugha kuu ya Mkusanyiko huu
Kwa mfano: "Vitabu vya Afya", "PNG Hadithi za Wanyama"

trans-unit.source: What would you like to call this collection?
trans-unit.target: Je, ungependa kuupa mkusanyiko huu jina lipi?

trans-unit.source: If you already have a collection you want to open, click the 'Cancel' button.
trans-unit.target: Iwapo tayari una mkusanyiko ambao ungependa kufungua, kliki kwenye kifute cha 'Batilisha'.

trans-unit.source: A collection of shell or template books in one or more languages of wider communication. You will be able to upload these shells to BloomLibrary.org. You may also make a Bloom Pack to give to others so that they can make local language books with your shells.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko wa sheli au vitabu vya vigezo katika lugha moja au zaidi za mawasiliano mapana. Utaweza kuziweka sheli hizi kwenye BloomLibrary.org. Pia unaweza kutengeneza Seti ya Bloom kuwapa wengine ili waweze kutengeneza vitabu kwa lugha ya mama kutoka kwa sheli zako.
Mkusanyikko wa Lugha ya mama/Lugha ya eneo

trans-unit.source: A collection of books in a local language.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko wa vitabu katika lugha ya eneo.

trans-unit.source: These are optional. Bloom will place them in the right places on title page of books you create.
trans-unit.target: Hizi sio za lazimaBloom itaziweka mahali panapofaa kwenye ukurasa wa mada ya vitabu utakavyotengeneza.

trans-unit.note: The {0} is replaced by the name of the language.

trans-unit.source: Unable to create a new collection using that name.
You are almost ready to start making books.
In order to keep things simple and organized, Bloom keeps all the books you make in one or more Collections. The first thing we need to do is make one for you.
trans-unit.target: Ili kufanya mambo kuwa rahisi na kuwa yenye mpangilio, Bloom huweka vitabu vyote unavyotengeneza kwenye Mkusanyikommoja au zaidi. Jambo la kwanza tunalopaswa kufanya ni kukutengenezea moja.

trans-unit.source: Bloom detected that this collection is located in your Dropbox folder. This can cause problems as Dropbox sometimes locks Bloom out of its own files. If you have problems, we recommend that you move your collection somewhere else or disable Dropbox while using Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom iligundua kuwa mkusanyiko huu uko kwenye folda yako ya dropbox. Hii inaweza kusababisha matatizo kwa kuwa wakati mwingine dropboksi wakati mwingine hufungia Bloom kutoka kwa faili zake. Iwapo una matatizo, tunapendekeza kuwa usongeshe mkusanyiko wako mahali pengine au uizime dropboksi yako utakapokuwa ukitumia Bloom.

trans-unit.source: This collection is part of your 'Sources for new books' which you can see in the bottom left of the Collections tab. It cannot be opened for editing.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko huu ni sehemu ya 'Vyanzo vya vitabu vipya' ambavyo unaweza kuviona chini upande wa kushoto wa Nembo ya Mkusanyiko. Haiwezi kufunguliwa ili kuhakikiwa.

trans-unit.note: This shows in the file-open dialog that you use to open a different bloom collection

trans-unit.source: Browse for another collection on this computer
trans-unit.target: Tafuta kwa kutumia mtandao mkusanyiko mwingine ulio kwenye kompyuta hii

trans-unit.source: Copy From Chorus Hub on Local Network
trans-unit.target: Nakili kutoka kwa Chorus Hub kwenye Mfumo wa mtandao wa Eneo
Nakili kutoka kwa Kiendesha mtambo cha USB

trans-unit.note: This opens the Chorus Help to learn more about send/receive.

trans-unit.source: Has someone else used Send/Receive to share a collection with you?\nUse one of these red buttons to copy their collection to your computer.\nLater, use Send/Receive to share your work back with them.
trans-unit.target: Je, kuna yeyote ambaye ametumia Tuma/Pokea kutumia mkusanyiko na wewe?\nTumia mojawapo wa vifute hivi vya rangi nyekundu ili kunakili mkusanyiko wake kwenye kompyuta yako.\nBaadaye, tumia Tuma/Pokea ili kuwatumia tena kazi yako.

trans-unit.source: Pages can not be re-ordered when you are translating a book.
trans-unit.target: Kurasa haziwezi kupangwa upya unapotafsiri kitabu.

trans-unit.source: Please install Adobe Reader so that Bloom can show your completed book. Until then, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali weka Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe ili Bloom iweze kuonyesha kitabu chako kilichokamilika. Hadi hapo, bado unaweza kuhifadhi PDF Kitabu na ukifungue kwenye programu nyingine.

trans-unit.source: That's strange... Adobe Reader gave an error when trying to show that PDF. You can still try saving the PDF Book.
trans-unit.target: Hilo sio jambo la kawaida... Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe kilionyesha kuwepo kwa hitilafu katika harakati ya kujaribu kuonyesha hiyo PDF. Bado unaweza kujaribu kuhifadhi PDF Kitabu.

trans-unit.source: Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\nPlease uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\nUntil you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Ripoti Mbaya. Bloom haikuweza kupata Kifaa cha Adobe cha Kusoma ili kuonyesha hapa, hivyo Bloom haiwezi kukuonyesha kitabu chako kilichokamilika.\nTafadhali toa tafsiri ilioko ya 'Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe' na uweke upya 'Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe'.\nHadi utakapoweza kufanya hivyo, bado uaweza kuhifadhi PDF Kitabu na kukifungua kwenye programu nyingine.

trans-unit.source: Make a booklet from the inside pages of the book. Pages will be laid out and reordered so that when you fold it, you'll have a booklet.\n
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza kijitabu kutokana na kurasa za ndani za kitabuKurasa zitatolewa na kupangwa upya ili utakapokikunja, utakuwa na kijitabua.\n

trans-unit.source: Upload to BloomLibrary.org, where others can download and localize into their own language.
trans-unit.target: Weka kwa BloomLibrary.org, pale ambapo watu wengine wanaweza kukitoa na kukitafsiri kwa lugha zao wenyewe.

trans-unit.source: Make a PDF of just the front and back (both sides), so you can print on colored paper.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza PDF ya mbele tu na nyuma (pande zote), ili uweze kuchapisha kwenye karatasi ya rangi.

trans-unit.source: Make an ePUB (electronic book) out of this book, allowing it to be read on various electronic reading devices.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza ePUB (kitabu cha kielektroniki) kutokana na kitabu hiki, ukikiruhusu kuweza kusomwa kwenye vifaa tofauti vya kusoma vya kielektroniki.
Habari kuhusu Muundo wa Ndani wa XML
trans-unit.note: This is the title of a dialog about exporting a Bloom book to the InDesign XML format

trans-unit.source: This PDF viewer can be improved by installing the free Adobe Reader on this computer.
trans-unit.target: PDF kifaa cha kutazama kinaweza kuboreshwa kwa kuweka kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe cha bure kwenye kompyuta hii.

trans-unit.note: Instead of making a booklet, just make normal pages

trans-unit.source: Make a PDF of every page of the book, one page per piece of paper.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza PDF ya kila ukurasa wa kitabu, ukurasa mmoja kwa kila kipande cha karatasi.

trans-unit.source: Open the PDF in the default system PDF viewer
trans-unit.target: Fungua PDF kifaa cha kutazama kwenye mfumo wa kawaida PDF

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem making a PDF of this book. You may need technical help or to contact the developers. But here are some things you can try:
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilikuwa na tatizo katika kutengeneza PDF kitabu hiki. Unaweza kuhitaji usaidizi wa kifundi au uwasiliane na wataalamu husika wa Bloom. Lakini hapa ni baadhi ya mambo unayoweza kujaribu:

trans-unit.source: Try doing this on a computer with more memory
trans-unit.target: Jaribu kufanya hivi kwa kompyuta iliyo na nafasi zaidi

trans-unit.source: Restart your computer and try this again right away
trans-unit.target: Fungua upya kompyuta yako na na ujaribuu hii tena mara moja

trans-unit.source: Replace large, high-resolution images in your document with lower-resolution ones
trans-unit.target: Weka picha zilizo na uthabiti wa chini kwenye nafasi ya zile zilizo na udhabiti wa juu kwenye chapisho lako

trans-unit.source: All rights reserved (Contact the Copyright holder for any permissions.)
trans-unit.target: Haki zote zimehifadhiwa (Wasiliana na anayemiliki haki ili kupata Idhini yoyote.)

trans-unit.source: BloomLibrary.org already has a previous version of this book from you. If you upload it again, it will be replaced with your current version.
trans-unit.target: BloomLibrary.org Tayari ina tafsiri nyingine ya kitabu hiki kutoka kwako.Iwapo utakiweka tena, tafsiri hiyo nafasi yake itachukuliwa na tafsiri yako ya sasa.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was a problem uploading {0}. Some details follow. You may need technical help.
trans-unit.target: Samahani, kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuweka {0}. Baadhi ya maelezo yanafuata. Unaweza kuhitaji usaidizi wa kiufundi.

trans-unit.source: One or more fields above need your attention before uploading.
trans-unit.target: Nyanja moja au zaidi ya zilizoko hapo juu zinahitaji uangalifu wako kabla ya kuweka.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, "{0}" was not successfully uploaded. Sometimes this is caused by temporary problems with the servers we use. It's worth trying again in an hour or two. If you regularly get this problem please report it to us.
trans-unit.target: Samahani, "" haikufaulu kuwekwa. Wakati mwingine hii husababishwa na matatizo yasiyo ya kudumu yanayotokana na vifaa tunavyotumia. Ni muhimu kujaribu tena kwa muda wa saa moja au mbili. Iwapo utapata tatizo hili mara kwa mara tafadhali piga ripoti kwetu.

trans-unit.source: By uploading, you confirm your agreement with the Bloom Library Terms of Use and grant the rights it describes.
trans-unit.target: Kwa kuweka, unadhibitisha makubaliano yako na Masharti ya matumizi ya Maktaba ya Bloom na unaipa haki inayostahili.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuweka kitabu chako.

trans-unit.source: We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
trans-unit.target: Hatuwezi tukakufungulia akaunti kwa kutumia anwani hiyo, kwa kuwa tayari tuna akaunti inayotumia anwani hiyo. Je, badala yake ungependa kuingia kwenye akaunti yako?

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to verify your login. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haikuweza kuungana na mtandao ili kuthibitisha kuingia kwako. Tafadhali angalia intaneti yako.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to complete your login or signup. This could be a problem with your internet connection, our server, or some equipment in between.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haijaweza kuunganishwa na mtandao ili kukamilisha kuingia kwako akaunti yako au kufungua akaunti mpya. Hii inaweza kuwa tatizo kutokana na uunganishaji wa intaneti, mtandao wetu, au baadhi ya vifaa hapo katikati.

trans-unit.source: In order to sign up for a BloomLibrary.org account, you must check the box indicating that you agree to the BloomLibrary Terms of Use.
trans-unit.target: Ili kufungua akaunti ya BloomLibrary.org, unapaswa kuweka alama kwenye kisanduku ukiashiria kuwa unakubaliana na Sheria za Matumizi ya Maktaba ya Bloom.

trans-unit.source: We don't have a user on record with that email. Would you like to sign up?
trans-unit.target: Hatuna kwenye rekodi zetu yeyote anayetumia barua pepe hiyo. Je, ungependa kufungua akaunti?

trans-unit.source: Password and user ID did not match
trans-unit.target: Neno la siri na jina lako la utambulizo havikuambatana

trans-unit.source: Please agree to terms of use
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali kubaliana na Masharti ya Matumizi

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid email address. We will send an email to this address so you can reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali weka anwani za barua pepe inayotumika. Tutatuma barua pepe kwa anwani hii ili uweze kubadilisha neno lako la siri.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to reset your password. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haijaweza kuunganishwa na mtandao ili kubadilisha neno lako la siri. Tafadhali angalia intaneti yako.
Ubadilishaji wa neno la siri umefeli

trans-unit.source: We are sending an email to {0} with instructions for how to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Tunatuma barua pepe kwa {0} ikiwa na maagizo ya jinsi ya kubadilisha neno lako la siri.
Fungua akaunti yako kwa Maktaba ya Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not log in to BloomLibrary.org using your saved credentials. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haijaweza kuingia kwa BloomLibrary.org kwa kutumia hati za utambulisho zilizohifadhiwa. Tafadhali angalia intaneti yako.
Kutengeneza picha ya ukucha wa dole gumbai...

trans-unit.source: Sorry, this version of Bloom Desktop is not compatible with the current version of BloomLibrary.org. Please upgrade to a newer version.
trans-unit.target: Samahani, tafsiri hii ya kompyuta ya Bloom haiambatani na tafsiri iliyopo yao BloomLibrary.org. Tafadhali ifanye kuwa ya tafsiri ya hivi karibuni.

trans-unit.note: This is added after the language name, in order to indicate that some parts of the book have not been translated into this language yet.

trans-unit.source: Please log in to BloomLibrary.org (or sign up) before uploading
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali ingia kwenye BloomLibrary.org (au ufungue akaunti) kabla ya kuweka

trans-unit.source: Please set this from the edit tab
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali andaa hii kutoka kwa chaguo la kuhariri
trans-unit.note: This shows next to the license, if the license has not yet been set.

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Assigning a Creative Commons License makes it easy for you to clearly grant certain permissions to everyone.
trans-unit.target: Pendekezo: Kupeana leseni bunifu ya Kawaida huifanya rahisi kwako kupeana idhini fulani kwa kila mtu.

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Creative Commons Licenses make it much easier for others to use your book, even if they aren't fluent in the language of your custom license.
trans-unit.target: Pendekezo: Leseni Bunifu za Kawaida, hufanya kuwa rahisi zaidi kwa wengine kutumia kitabu chako, hata kama hawana ufasaha katika lugha yako ya leseni ya kawaida.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book. This is probably because your computer is set to use the wrong timezone or your system time is badly wrong. See http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html for how to fix this.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuweka kitabu chako. Hii huenda ikawa ni kwa sababu kompyuta yako imeundwa ili kutumia wakati usio sahihi wa eneo au saa yako ya mfumo ni mbaya sana. Tazama http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html jinsi ya kurekebisha hii.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, "{0}" is now available on BloomLibrary.org ({1})
There was a problem uploading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuweka kitabu chako. Unaweza kuhitajika kufungua upya Bloom au kupata usaidizii wa kiufudi.

trans-unit.note: In this step, Bloom is uploading things like title, languages, and topic tags to the BloomLibrary.org database.

trans-unit.source: Please add texts to the Sample Texts folder.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali ongeza maandishi kwa folda ya Sampuli ya Maandishi.
Idadi ya juu zaidi ya maneno kwa kila kitabu

trans-unit.source: Click on letters to add them to this stage.
trans-unit.target: Kliki kwenye herufi ili kuziongeza kwa awamu hii.

trans-unit.source: E.g. "ai oo sh ng th ing"
trans-unit.target: Kwa mfano "ai oo sh ng th"

trans-unit.source: Help exporting and converting files to use as sample texts
trans-unit.target: Saidia katika kutuma na kubadilisha faili ili kutumika kama sampuli ya maandishi

trans-unit.source: List letters and word-forming characters in alphabetic order.
trans-unit.target: Orodhesha herufi na herufi zinazounda maneno katika mpangilio wa alfabeti.

trans-unit.source: To help you make decodable readers, Bloom needs to know the letters and letter combinations that you will be teaching.
trans-unit.target: Ili kukusaidia kutengeneza kifaa cha kusoma kinachoweza kufasiriwa, Bloom inahitaji kujua herufi na uunganishaji wa herufi utakaokuwa ukifundisha.

trans-unit.source: Separate each letter or letter combination with a space. For example, here is what we might use for the English language:
trans-unit.target: Tenganisha kila herufi au uunganishaji wa herufi kwa nafasi. Kwa mfano, hapa ni kile tunachoweza kutumia kwa lugha ya Kiingereza:

trans-unit.source: Notice that the English list includes symbols that are used to make words, like ' in
trans-unit.target: Tambua kuwa orodha ya kiingereza inajumuisha alama zinazotumiwa kutengeneza maneno, kama ' katika

trans-unit.source: Maximum Average Length of Sentences in Book
trans-unit.target: Urefu wa wastani wa juu zaidi wa sentensi katika kitabu
Idadi ya juu zaidi ya maneno ya kipekee kwenye kitabu

trans-unit.source: Open the sample texts folder for this language.
trans-unit.target: Fungua folda ile ile ya maandishi kwa lugha hii.
Idadi ya juu zaidi ya maneno kwa kila ukurasa
Orodha ya Maneno na Sampuli ya Matini
, Injini ya Kutafuta ya Kusoma na Kuandika.
Herufi za hapo awali na zile mpya
Idadi ya juu zaidi ya maneno kwa kila Sentensi.
Andaa kifaa cha Kusoma kinachoweza Kufasiriwa
Andaa kifaa cha kusoma kilichopewa ngazi

trans-unit.source: Set up the alphabet for this language.
Things to remember for this level:
trans-unit.target: Mambo ya kukumbukwa kuhusu ngazi hii:

trans-unit.source: To help you make decodable readers, Bloom can suggest words that fit within the current stage. There are two ways to give words to Bloom:
trans-unit.target: Ili kukusaidia kutengeneza vifaa vya kusoma vinavyoweza kufasiriwa, Bloom inaweza kupendekeza maneno ambayo yanaweza kutoshea kati ya awamu iliopo. Kuna njia mbili za kupeana majina kwa Bloom.
Folda ya Sampuli yako ya Matini

trans-unit.source: We are using lists of allowed words to define stages
trans-unit.target: Tunatumia orodha ya maneno yaliyokubaliwa ili kutoa maelezo kuhusu awamu

trans-unit.source: We are using letters with sight words to define stages
trans-unit.target: Tunatumia herufi zilizo na maneno yanayoonekana kutoa maelezo kuhusu awamu

trans-unit.source: In addition, this Bloom Pack will carry your latest decodable and leveled reader settings for the \"{0}\" language. Anyone opening this Bloom Pack, who then opens a \"{0}\" collection, will have their current decodable and leveled reader settings replaced by the settings in this Bloom Pack. They will also get the current set of words for use in decodable readers.
trans-unit.target: Kwa kuongeza, seti hii ya Bloom itabeba mpangilio wa kifaa cha kusoma kilichopewa ngazi na kinachoweza kufasiriwa cha hivi karibuni cha lugha ya \"{0}\". Yeyote anayefungua seti hii ya Bloom, ambaye basi anafungua mkusanyiko wa \"{0}\" , atahitajika kubadilisha mpangilio wa kifaa chake cha kusoma kilichopewa ngazi na kutumia mpangilio ulio kwenye seti hii ya Bloom. Pia atapata kikundi cha majina ya kisasa ili kuyatumia kwenye vifaa vya kusoma vinavyoweza kufasiriwa.

trans-unit.source: The following books will be made into templates:

trans-unit.target: Tengeneza Seti ya Bloom ya Kifaa cha kusoma

trans-unit.source: Please take a minute to register {0}
trans-unit.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.
Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.

trans-unit.source: I'm stuck, I'll finish this later.

trans-unit.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.
Shown in the button that closes the dialog after a successful report submission.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to submit your report directly to our server. Please retry or email {0} to {1}.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haikuweza kupeana ripoti yako moja kwa moja hadi kwa mtandao wetu.Tafadhali jaribu tena au uandike barua pepe {0} kwa {1}.
Jumuisha picha hii ya kutoka kwa skrini

trans-unit.note: Shown if there was an error submitting the report. Lets the user try submitting it again.

trans-unit.source: See what else will be submitted
trans-unit.target: Tazama ni nini kingine kinapaswa kupeanwa

trans-unit.note: This is shown while Bloom is sending the problem report to our server.

trans-unit.source: We received your report, thanks for taking the time to help make Bloom better!
trans-unit.target: Tulipokea ripoti yako, asante kwa kutenga muda wako ili kusaidia Bloom kuwa bora zaidi!

trans-unit.source: What seems to be the problem?
trans-unit.target: Je, ni nini inaonekana kuwa tatizo?

trans-unit.note: This is shown while Bloom is creating the problem report. It's generally too fast to see, unless you include a large book.

trans-unit.source: I get it. Do not show this again.
Please notice the sample printer settings below. Use them as a guide while you set up the printer.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali tambua sampuli ya mpangilio wa mtambo wa kuchapisha hapa chini. Utumia kama mwongozo unapoandaa mtambo wa kuchapisha.

trans-unit.source: A blank page that allows you to add items.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa ulio mtupu unaokuruhusu kuongeza vipengee.

trans-unit.source: Page with a picture on top and a large, centered word below.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa ulio na picha juu na jina kubwa lilioandikwa katikati hapa chini.

trans-unit.note: This label indicates a page with one arithmetic problem on it.
This label indicates a page with two arithmetic problems on it.
This label indicates a page with three arithmetic problems on it.
This label indicates a page with four arithmetic problems on it.

trans-unit.target: Jalada la Ndani upande wa Nyuma
Jalada la ndani upande wa nje
